GenAiPlugin.description: Create different request types based on inputs provided by end user. This topic is chosen when users need to create a special pricing request for various products.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the query is about creating a special pricing request, use SvcCopilotTmpl__CreateCase.
Ensure all required details are collected before submitting the request.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only create and submit special pricing requests based on user inputs. This includes ensuring all necessary information is provided and accurately submitting the request.
